title: My Mate's account has been Banned.
body:
My mate woke up this morning to find that his account was permanently Suspended for using 3rd party malicious software. The thing here is that hes never used 3rd party software at all nor has any collection of installing any. Could this be an error on Riot's side? Hes not in a state to post anything at this time which is why I'm doing it on his behalf. 

His summoner name is Madvoyager.

replies.body:
http://puu.sh/nkagW/62ffe4b5e0.jpg\

That Xerath KDA is suspicious, considering he's Bronze 3 and it doesn't match up with his other champs. Xerath is also a popular champion for scripting. 

I'm not saying he's guilty, but....

http://puu.sh/nkaNf/a8b213e70c.jpg

 A sudden burst of 9 Xerath games a month ago...

Wow those images are so small did you make them in a format used for computers made 20 years ago??


But still. This guy could be a main Xerath. Or the fact most people in Bronze to silver dont know how to deal with an okay let alone good Xerath player. 

Look at some of the games i had all the way up to Gold on my main account. No one knew how to deal with a Galio. Seriously so many would say "I have never vs'd a galio!!"

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=xl2RdrjI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-02-25T01:28:09.194+0000)
>
> Wow those images are so small did you make them in a format used for computers made 20 years ago??
> 
> 
> But still. This guy could be a main Xerath. Or the fact most people in Bronze to silver dont know how to deal with an okay let alone good Xerath player. 
> 
> Look at some of the games i had all the way up to Gold on my main account. No one knew how to deal with a Galio. Seriously so many would say "I have never vs'd a galio!!"

That's because Galio is almost never picked, regardless of where you are. He's also a pretty basic Champion. Xerath on the other hand is common for scripters, is picked a decent amount and is much harder to do well and win with. The player was also losing most of their games unless they picked Xerath where they suddenly won almost every game and had great KDAs.

Send in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) 

Cautiion- it may take a lil while for Riot to get back to you (1-3 days), but please don't continue to spam tickets, as it will push you towards the bottom of the que.

In the meantime, [check this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt) and see if your mate recognizes anything he may have used.
lol dem xeraths. get rekt scrublord

I have been playing since season one and I have been perma-suspended as well, apparently loads of people have been banned for the same reason as I have.. I haven't touched a third party program and never will.
